events.message: I recently bought a pair of headphones from your store but would like to request a refund as they do not work properly.
The customer's report about wanting money back for a faulty product is classified as a refund request.
The case has been assigned to refund specialist agent John Smith for further processing.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you are requesting a refund for the headphones?
My order number is 987654. The headphones have a constant static sound that makes them unusable.
We can initiate a full refund for your purchase once you provide the product back to us or confirm you want to keep it with a partial refund.
Thank you, I would prefer to send the headphones back for the full refund, please let me know how to proceed.
Your refund process has been started and the return shipping label has been emailed to you for sending the headphones back.
Just following up to ensure you received the return label and to check if you need any further assistance with your refund.
The refund case has been successfully closed after confirmation of the returned product and refund issued to your account.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to rate your experience with the refund process. Your feedback is appreciated.
